title: About That Block
description: Neil and Kyle are in The Lab to dissect the crazy ending to Game 1. We discuss JR's blunder, highlight what the Cavs did right and wonder what more LeBron has to do.
itunes:title: About That Block
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Neil and Kyle are in The Lab to dissect the crazy ending to Game 1. We discuss JR's blunder, highlight what the Cavs did right and wonder what more LeBron has to do.
